scripts.bump: npm run bump --workspaces=true && npm run bump:config
scripts.bump:config:babel: cat ./configs/babel/babel.config.json | jq --arg CORE_JS_VERSION `cat ./node_modules/@babel/runtime-corejs3/package.json | jq -r .version` '(.plugins[] | select(.[0] == "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime"))[1].version = $CORE_JS_VERSION' | prettier --parser json > ./configs/babel/babel.config.json.tmp && mv ./configs/babel/babel.config.json.tmp ./configs/babel/babel.config.json
scripts.start: echo TODO: use concurrently to run parallel
